import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Button } from "react-bootstrap"; const ContentListItem = (props) => { const [ressource, setRessource] = useState(""); const [list, setList] = useState([]); const getItems = async (ressource) => { const response = await fetch( `https://pokeapi.co/api/v2/item-category/${ressource}` ); const result = await response.json(); console.log(result); return result; }; const handleClick = (event, ressource) => { event.preventDefault(); setRessource(ressource); }; useEffect(() => { console.log(ressource); getItems(ressource).then((result) => setList(result)); }, [ressource]); getItems(); return ( <>
); }; export default ContentListItem;
